^(credential_name)$.description: Name of the storage credential used with this location.

^(read_only)$.description: Indicates whether the external location is read-only.

^(skip_validation)$.description: Skips validation of the storage credential associated with the external location.

credentialName.description: Name of the storage credential used with this location.

readOnly.description: Indicates whether the external location is read-only.

skipValidation.description: Skips validation of the storage credential associated with the external location.

url.description: Path URL of the external location.
